updates.description: Added dark mode support across the entire site. Improved mobile navigation with smoother transitions. Fixed several accessibility issues to ensure better screen reader compatibility. Optimized image loading for faster page rendering.

Implemented new typography system with improved readability. Added the Books section with filtering capabilities. Redesigned the command menu for better usability. Integrated with Ghost CMS for easier content management.

Launched the Quotes page featuring curated insights. Improved site performance with code splitting and lazy loading. Added keyboard shortcuts for power users. Enhanced search functionality with better result relevance.

Initial release of krisyotam.com featuring a minimalist design focused on content readability. Includes Home, About, and Blog sections. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS for optimal performance and maintainability.
